title: The Chang'An Youth
overview: To repay her good friend Shen Dieyi, Shen Yiyi heads to Chang'an on behalf of her to fulfill a marriage contract. There, she meets Yang Zian, Tang Jiuhua, Li Xinyuan, Dugu Meixue. Each of them hides a secret about their actual identity and motive. Together, they begin their studies at the Shang Yi Guan.
